questions.question: When Antonio beats the Vitamin Kid, he says "there was no sweetness in the victory." Why?

choices.answer: He pushed the Vitamin Kid as he ran so it was an unfair race
He felt that their childhood was starting to come to an end
The school year was over so it didn't even matter
The Vitamin Kid was used to not winning

questions.question: A ranch in Agua Negra has been cursed. What is one of the things that has been happening?

choices.answer: All of the birds are dying
The earth has dried up and nothing can grow
The pots and pans lift into the air and crash
All of the children are contracting a horrific skin disease

questions.question: Who/what has the curse been laid on?

choices.answer: The owner of the ranch
Another one of Antonio's uncles
The daughter of the ranch owner
The ghosts of three Indians who were hanged on the ranch

questions.question: How do Ultima, Gabriel, and Antonio rid the ranch of the curse?

choices.answer: They erect a platform and burn three bundles on it
They sacrifice a coyote and sprinkle its blood on the earth
They pray to the Virgin of the Guadalupe for guidance
They call the priest to come bless the ranch

questions.question: What happens to Florence while swimming in the Blue Lake?

choices.answer: He sees the Golden Carp
He drowns
He finally asks for penance
He yells that he does not believe in God

questions.question: Where does Antonio run to after Florence drowns?

choices.answer: He runs to Ultima to seek comfort
He runs with Cico to see the Golden Carp
He runs down to the river and wades in it
He runs the llano and screams into the wind

questions.question: Which three people does Antonio see in his dream at the start of Ch. 22?

choices.answer: The Trementina sisters
His three brothers
The three people he has seen die
Horse, Bones, and Samuel

questions.question: How does Gabriel explain the concept of "understanding" to Antonio?

choices.answer: Understanding comes when you take holy communion
Understanding means having sympathy for people
Understanding comes from God
it means asking for forgiveness from those you hurt

questions.question: Where does Antonio go for the summer?

choices.answer: To study the Bible with Father Byrnes
To work the land with his uncles
To learn to be a vaquero on the llano
To Las Vegas to visit his brothers

questions.question: What happens to Antonio when he is walking to his grandfather's house from the fields?

choices.answer: He loses the key to the house
He is almost run over by Tenorio
He sees the Trementina sisters performing another curse
He gets lost and has to follow the river home

questions.question: Who kills Tenorio when he tries to kill Antonio?

choices.answer: Gabriel
Ultima
Uncle Pedro
Andrew

questions.question: What happens when Tenorio kills Ultima's owl?

choices.answer: Ultima begins to die because the owl was her soul
The owl's feathers blow over the llano
The waters of the river turn wild and flood
Antonio finally is able to commune with God

questions.question: What does Ultima ask Antonio to do with the owl?

choices.answer: Build a platform and burn it
Pour its blood over the grave of Tenorio
Bury it beneath a forked juniper tree
Lie on the alter in the church
